deletion_details.item_text: Ensure your estate planning is up to date

right_box_analysis.continuous_line_description: Line starts at the top of the box, crosses through all text items, and ends at the bottom.

deletion_details.item_text: Please refer to our online estate planning report located on our website (https://www.mlfs.com.au/estate-planning/). Based on this report you may need to:
Have an Enduring Power of Attorney
Set out in your Will who will be the beneficiary of your assets on death and when they will receive them

row_deletion_rule.explanation: Both left and right boxes have diagonal marks interrupting all their content, so the entire row should be deleted.

visual_description: Both boxes have diagonal lines crossing through all text, indicating deletion of all content in the row.
